name: Waddle in Time
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 51. 

THE WORLD IS ENDING!!!

You are a time travelling penguin. You need to stop the end of the world.

The problem: Your time machine is broken and can only travel back in time in 10 second intervals.

What can you do? FIX IT!!!!

Fix the time machine and to get out of your 10 second time loop to save the world!

Controls:

LMB: Interact, open cabinets

RMB: Open cabinets

Mouse: Navigate screen

Thanks for playing!!
